prompts: Create a unique ice-type Pokemon that resembles a snowflake and has icy blue tones.
I want a Pokemon design that embodies the essence of winter with sharp edges and a crystalline form.
Generate an ice-themed Pokemon that looks like it's made of frozen water with a dazzling appearance.
Make a Pokemon that has a geometric, icy design, showcasing shades of blue and white.
Imagine a Pokemon that captures the chill of a blizzard, featuring intricate ice patterns and a frosty aura.
Design a snowflake-inspired Pokemon with a glimmering icy body and sharp, frozen appendages.
Give me an original concept for an ice-type Pokemon that is both beautiful and intimidating at first sight.
